T02TD3050E:96b-0: @96b ` // khro bo'i rgyal po rdo rje gnam lcags 'bar ba'i sgrub thabs klu 'dul ba'i ngan thabs bzhugs so//
T02TD3050E:96b-3: #/ // / khro bo chen po rdo rje gnam lcags 'bar ba nag po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3050E:96b-4: dang por gnas dben par mtshams bcad de /
T02TD3050E:96b-6: khro bo nyid mandal gyi steng du sbyan drang zhing mchod cing bstod de bsnyen pa bya /
T02TD3050E:96b-7: las kyi dus su bdag ni lhar bya ste /
T02TD3050E:96b-8: dang po stong pa nyid du bsgom /
T02TD3050E:96b-9: de nas yan lag bdun gyis bsod nams kyi tshogs bsag go //
T02TD3050E:96b-10: de nas 'byung ba rim brtsegs kyis gzhal yas khang yang gzhung bzhin du bskyed /
T02TD3050E:96b-11: de nas pam las padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bsam /
T02TD3050E:96b-12: de'i thog tu mam las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam /
T02TD3050E:96b-13: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su h'um 'od dang ldan pa cig bsam /
T02TD3050E:96b-14: 'od kyi dbus nas sdon po 'brug skad du grags 'od dang ldan pa cig bsam /
T02TD3050E:96b-16: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs dam rgyud bskul /
T02TD3050E:96b-17: 'gro ba sems can gyi don mdzad /
T02TD3050E:96b-19: aom a'a: h'um su pi tri zhes pa las /
T02TD3050E:96b-20: bdag nyid khro bo chen po rdo rje 'bar ba /
T02TD3050E:96b-21: sku mdog dbyar gyi char sprin ltar sdo nag tu gnas pa /
T02TD3050E:96b-22: khro gnyer rgya mtsho'i rlabs bzhin gtsigs pa /
T02TD3050E:96b-24: spyan gser btso ma ltar dmar ser /
T02TD3050E:96b-25: smin ma dmar po gyen du bskyod pa /
T02TD3050E:96b-26: mchu sder rdo rje gnam lcags las byas pa /
T02TD3050E:96b-27: 'dab gshog nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa /
T02TD3050E:96b-30: dbu skra kham nag gyen du brdzes pa /
T02TD3050E:96b-31: sbrul gyis rked chings byas pa /
T02TD3050E:96b-33: g-yang gzhi rlon ba stod la gsol ba /
T02TD3050E:96b-34: stag gi g-yang gzhis sham thabs byas pa /
T02TD3050E:96b-35: klu'i rgyal po gzi can thod du byas pa /
T02TD3050E:96b-36: klu'i rgyal po taksha ka rked chings byas pa /
T02TD3050E:96b-37: klu'i rgyal po sog ma med gdan khrir byas pa zhabs kyis gzir ba /
T02TD3050E:96b-38: yan lag sbrul gyis brgyan pa /
T02TD3050E:96b-39: phyag dang po gnyis rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa /
T02TD3050E:96b-40: bar ma gnyis g-yas ral gri g-yon seng ldeng gi phur bu bsnams pa /
T02TD3050E:96b-41: g-yas tha ma na gnam lcags kyi tho ba /
T02TD3050E:96b-42: g-yon lcags kyu dang zhags pa bsnams pa /
T02TD3050E:97a-0: rdo rje gnam lcags kyi phreng ba se ral khar @97a * //
T02TD3050E:97a-2: thod pa skom rlon gyi phreng bas do shal byas pa /
T02TD3050E:97a-3: me'i se rab phab nas klu'i gnas bsregs pa /
T02TD3050E:97a-4: sku las ye shes kyi me 'bar ba /
T02TD3050E:97a-5: sbrin nag 'khyil pa'i nang na bzhugs pa cig tu bdag bsgom mo //
T02TD3050E:97a-6: de ye shes lngas dbang bskur /
T02TD3050E:97a-7: sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab po //
T02TD3050E:97a-8: de nas rdo rje sna nan bya ba ni bdag bskyed pa'o //
T02TD3050E:97a-9: de nas gzhan bskyed pa ni mdun du pam las padma 'dab ma brgyad pa /
T02TD3050E:97a-10: de'i steng du mam las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du h'um sngon po las dam tshig sems dpa' bskyed de //
T02TD3050E:97a-11: de nas ye shes sems dpa' spyan drang /
T02TD3050E:97a-12: aom su pi tri badzra dunti ma h'a kro dha /
T02TD3050E:97a-13: manda la ma h'a te a'a be sha ya aa a'a /
T02TD3050E:97a-15: de nas phyi nang gi mchod pa sngags kyis dbul lo //
T02TD3050E:97a-16: de nas gtor ma byin gyis brlabs la khro bo la dbul lo //
T02TD3050E:97a-17: aom su bi tri badzra dunte ma h'a kro dha ba lim bhunydza /
T02TD3050E:97a-19: kh'a hi kh'a hi sa ma ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD3050E:97a-20: de nas bstod bas bstod do //
T02TD3050E:97a-21: h'um me dpung sprin nag 'khyil pa'i klong dkyil nas //
T02TD3050E:97a-22: klu rgyal sog med 'khyil pa'i gdan stengs nas //
T02TD3050E:97a-23: khro rgyal rdo rje gnam lcags 'bar ba ni //
T02TD3050E:97a-24: zhal gsum phyag drug rdo rje'i gshog pa can //
T02TD3050E:97a-25: rdo rje'i gshog pa nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam //
T02TD3050E:97a-26: rdo rje sder tshe na gdengs pa ni /
T02TD3050E:97a-27: gdug pa'i klu rgyal snying 'dar cod pa nas la 'brul //
T02TD3050E:97a-28: h'um dang phat kyi gad rgyangs drag po yis //
T02TD3050E:97a-29: klu gdon gdug pa'i snying 'dar mgo bo 'gas //
T02TD3050E:97a-30: kha sbub bskyel te khrag sgyugs gas nas 'chi //
T02TD3050E:97a-31: rdo rje gnam lcags 'bar ba'i mchu ba dar nas //
T02TD3050E:97a-32: klu gdon gdrug pa'i snying khrag khong nas 'jib //
T02TD3050E:97a-33: ral ba kham nag gyen du g-yengs nas kyang //
T02TD3050E:97a-34: me yi ser bas klu yi pho brang 'joms //
T02TD3050E:97a-35: gshog pa gser gyi sbu gri brdabs nas kyang //
T02TD3050E:97a-36: rgya mtsho gshags nas klu rnams dum bur gtubs //
T02TD3050E:97a-37: sgro 'dab rdo rje lcags kyu 'bar ba yis //
T02TD3050E:97a-38: gdug pa'i klu rnams ma lus snying nas 'dren //
T02TD3050E:97a-39: g-yas kyi phyag rgyas byugs pa yis //
T02TD3050E:97a-40: lha chen brgyad kyi mgo bcad nas //
T02TD3050E:97a-41: bandha thogs pas dbu la brgyan //
T02TD3050E:97a-42: g-yon gyi phyag rgyas byugs pa yis //
T02TD3050E:97a-43: klu chen brgyad kyi snying phyung nas //
T02TD3050E:97a-44: rus sbal khog pa bkang nas gsol //
T02TD3050E:97b-0: g-yas kyi shes rab @97b ral gri yis //
T02TD3050E:97b-1: klu rnams ma lus gtub par mdzad //
T02TD3050E:97b-2: g-yon pa seng ldeng phur bu yis //
T02TD3050E:97b-3: klu rnams ma lus rtsad nas gcod //
T02TD3050E:97b-4: g-yas na gnam lcags tho ba yis //
T02TD3050E:97b-5: sa bdag pho mo rdul du rlog / g-yon pa lcags kyu zhags pa yis //
T02TD3050E:97b-7: / rdo rje 'bar ba'i ba sbu nas //
T02TD3050E:97b-8: mkha' lding mtshon cha'i char bab nas //
T02TD3050E:97b-9: gdug pa'i klu rnams brlag par mdzad //
T02TD3050E:97b-10: sku stod zhing chen g-yang gzhi gsol nas kyang //
T02TD3050E:97b-11: srid pa'i ma tshogs 'dar zhing sdud //
T02TD3050E:97b-12: sku smad stag gi sham thabs gsol nas kyang //
T02TD3050E:97b-13: gdug pa'i klu la stag ltar mchong bar byed //
T02TD3050E:97b-14: phyag na rdo rje thugs kyi sbrul pa'i sku //
T02TD3050E:97b-15: khro chen 'bar ba che la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD3050E:97b-16: bde gshegs gtum po khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD3050E:97b-17: bcom ldan klu gdug 'dul la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD3050E:97b-18: aom su bi tri badzra dunta ma h'a kro dha mi li mi li h'um phat /
T02TD3050E:97b-22: // / sgrub pa'i dus su phyag rgya dang po gnyis klu'i gnya' ba dang mkhrig ma nas bzung ste /
T02TD3050E:97b-23: mchu snying gar btsugs te khrag 'jib par bsam mo //
T02TD3050E:97b-24: klu gzir zhing bskrad de tshar bcad pa ni /
T02TD3050E:97b-25: rabs chad kyi thod pa'am lcags snod du /
T02TD3050E:97b-26: bag zan las kla'i gzugs sna tshogs byas /
T02TD3050E:97b-27: yungs kar dang mtshon bdar ba'i phye ma dang /
T02TD3050E:97b-28: bdug pa'i rdzas sna tshogs dang /
T02TD3050E:97b-29: sngags phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang bcas pas tshig cing skad ngan thon te bros so //
T02TD3050E:97b-30: phyag rgya ni mthe bong gnyis sbrel te nam mkha' lding gi gshog pa bzhin du byas te /
T02TD3050E:97b-31: aom tram sdum khrom h'um phat /
T02TD3050E:97b-32: de yis rgya mtsho gshegs nas klu gton te lcags kyu bsgril ma'i phyag rgya byas te h'um n'a gi h'um dza /
T02TD3050E:97b-33: gnya' ba nas bzung nas 'ongs par bsam /
T02TD3050E:97b-34: aom badzra pa ti ga ru da h'um h'um dza: dza: ra tsi sri dza h'um phat /
T02TD3050E:97b-35: phyag rgya ni mthe bong gnyis rtse sprad de bsgrengs /
T02TD3050E:97b-36: mdzub mo gnyis gcig la gcig 'khyud ;
T02TD3050E:97b-37: srin lag gnyis nang du bskum /
T02TD3050E:97b-38: mthe chung gnyis thad kar brkyang ste /
T02TD3050E:97b-39: dpral ba'i thad kar phyag rgya byas te /
T02TD3050E:97b-40: mtshog ma'i thad kar lan gsum bskor te dgrol bas de nyid du nam mkha' la sbrin nag po dang sngon po 'khrigs shing mtshon cha'i tshub ma phyogs kun nas langs te /
T02TD3050E:98a-1: mi bzod nas cho nges 'debs shing /
T02TD3050E:98a-2: aa la la khro bo'i rgyal po ci bsgo ba nyan no zer nas skyabs su song bar bsam mo //
T02TD3050E:98a-4: aom bi phu le pra ba re n'a ge ma h'a n'a ga hri da ya aa brte dzva la dzva la /
T02TD3050E:98a-5: sarba n'a ga hri da ya ne /
T02TD3050E:98a-7: n'a ga gu la bi dhvansa ni /
T02TD3050E:98a-9: sarba n'a ga hri da ya ni /
T02TD3050E:98a-11: sarba dushta n'a ga bha ba na ni /
T02TD3050E:98a-12: pa tsa ya pa tsa ya /
T02TD3050E:98a-13: sarba dusht'a na n'a g'a n'a na /
T02TD3050E:98a-14: aa kra ma aa kra ma /
T02TD3050E:98a-16: sa ga ra bi ma le /
T02TD3050E:98a-17: bi tra me ma h'a n'a ga te dza ba re sv'a h'a /
T02TD3050E:98a-18: de nas klu sgrag par bya'o //
T02TD3050E:98a-21: // / gnyen klu rigs dang gdon phal pa la /
T02TD3050E:98a-22: glang ru rta rkang dang nya mgo bya rtug dang /
T02TD3050E:98a-23: sgra shad dang gu gul nag po dang sbyar la bdug par bya'o //
T02TD3050E:98a-24: aom badzra tishtha badzra h'um phat /
T02TD3050E:98a-25: seng ldeng dang lcags kyi phur bul sum 'bum bzlas te snying gar gdab par bya'o //
T02TD3050E:98a-28: tsandra tsandri batta ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD3050E:98a-30: yungs kar dang til dang ske tshe dang tshon phye dang bye ma la sum 'bum bzlas te /
T02TD3050E:98a-31: brab cing gzir ba dang tshar gcad par bya'o //
T02TD3050E:98a-32: man 'a bsgags te phyis mi ldang bar bya'o //
T02TD3050E:98a-34: aom dza ta dza na n'a ga bi dza tishtha tishtha sa tsa ra si ti sv'a h'a /
T02TD3050E:98a-35: de lta bu ni gsad las thams cad la bya'o //
T02TD3050E:98a-36: 'byung po bskrad cing gsad par 'dod na /
T02TD3050E:98a-37: lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas dgug par bya /
T02TD3050E:98a-38: bdag gi dza'i 'od zer gyis klu'i khong du bstim par bya'o //
T02TD3050E:98a-39: khod du thim pa'i dza'i 'od zer smug nag tu gyur pas /
T02TD3050E:98a-40: klu la me 'bar te klu dang bsdongs pa'i 'byung po rnams kyang 'thab cing skad 'byung ste 'bros par 'gyur ro //
T02TD3050E:98a-41: ma h'a ru dra ru dra tha h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD3050E:98a-42: phyag rgya ni sor mo nang du bskum ste gung mo ga nyis rtse sbrad de bkug ste rgyag par bya'o //
T02TD3050E:98a-43: gang zhig klus gzir ba la stag gi mche ba dang /
T02TD3050E:98a-44: mtshon bdar ba'i phye ma dang /
T02TD3050E:98a-45: glang rong nag po'i chu nang du bskol lo //
T02TD3050E:98a-46: gar na bar bsku bar bya'o //
T02TD3050E:98a-47: rdo rje 'bar pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD3050E:98a-48: yang na khyi'i gcin la bya'o //
T02TD3050E:98a-51: // / klu la mchod pa bya zhing dug dbyung ba ni /
T02TD3050E:98a-53: klu'i gzugs kyis dgod par bya'o //
T02TD3050E:98a-54: de bzhin klu sman mtshon pa bsag / de nas klu rnams sbyan drangs la //
T02TD3050E:98b-0: dkar gsum @98b mngar gsum mchod pa 'bul /
T02TD3050E:98b-1: aom badzra p'a ni bya ba sarba bitta n'a ga r'a dza sum bha ni h'um /
T02TD3050E:98b-2: rgyal sras thugs rje'i mchog mnga' ba'i //
T02TD3050E:98b-3: 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal bsal ba dang //
T02TD3050E:98b-4: mtho ris thar ba bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02TD3050E:98b-5: gsang sngags dam las ma 'da' zhig / khyod kyi sems las 'das gyur te //
T02TD3050E:98b-6: byang chub bde ba bskyed pa dang //
T02TD3050E:98b-7: nyon mongs sdug bsngal zhi ba'i phyir //
T02TD3050E:98b-8: khyod la rab tu skrag par bya //
T02TD3050E:98b-9: thams cad bde ba'i sa bon te //
T02TD3050E:98b-10: bde ba thams cad 'grub pa yin //
T02TD3050E:98b-12: 'chi bdag gi ni gsal shing ltar //
T02TD3050E:98b-13: rdo rje'i mtshon cha rnon po yis //
T02TD3050E:98b-14: khyod kyi yan lag gcod par 'gyur //
T02TD3050E:98b-15: aom sva ta badzra h'um ka ra dra ba dra ba bi dr'a ba pi ya na shan na ha na h'um phat /
T02TD3050E:98b-16: sngags des klu'i sems kyi dkyil 'khor la 'khor bar sgong gis song bar bsam mo //
T02TD3050E:98b-17: sngags des klu'i sems la yod pa'i sgrib pa byang nas /
T02TD3050E:98b-18: chos thos pa'i sems byang chub tu brtan par gyur nas ;
T02TD3050E:98b-19: sngon phyag na rdo rje'i bka' rjes su dran nas /
T02TD3050E:98b-20: slob dpon yin snyam nas tshur mi gnod par stong grogs byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD3050E:98b-21: ci bsgo ba nyan par 'gyur ro //
T02TD3050E:98b-24: // / de bzhin du char dbab par 'dod na /
T02TD3050E:98b-25: klu sgrub pa dang mchod pa gzhung bzhin byas /
T02TD3050E:98b-27: klu yi gzugs kyis dgod par bya //
T02TD3050E:98b-28: dbus su khro bo de nyid bsgom //
T02TD3050E:98b-29: 'khor gyi klu rnams mchod cing bstod //
T02TD3050E:98b-31: de yis phebs par ma gyur na //
T02TD3050E:98b-32: thod pa shin tu dkar pa la //
T02TD3050E:98b-33: sog med bskyed la gzir bar bya //
T02TD3050E:98b-34: lcags sam rabs chad thod pa ru //
T02TD3050E:98b-35: klu gzugs brubs te bdug cing gzir //
T02TD3050E:98b-39: // / ser ba la thal chen dang dug dang yungs kar dang sbyin sreg byas pa'i thal bas bya'o //
T02TD3050E:98b-42: // / dgra la chu skol gyis bya'o //
T02TD3050E:98b-47: gzhan bsrung ba ni skud pa dang sngags dang rdzas kyis bya'o //
T02TD3050E:98b-50: // / n'a ga tsitta rakta pi pa dos ma ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD3050E:98b-52: aom n'a ga ha na ha na h'um phat /
T02TD3050E:98b-53: n'a ga da ha da ha h'um phat /
